item.title: According to the Brand Finance Global 500 2016 report, Disney is recognized as the most influential brand in the world
item.description:
· Out of the top 10 fastest growing brands, four are Chinese. · Disney is the world’s most influential brand due to the immense success of Star Wars. · Despite experiencing a decline in sales, Apple’s brand value increased by 14% to US$145.9 billion, making it the most valuable brand globally. · Volkswagen’s brand value experienced a decline of US$12 billion as a consequence of the emissions controversy. · Leading brands are outperforming the S&P 500 average in terms of share performance...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/according-to-the-brand-finance-global-500-2016-report-disney-is-recognized-as-the-most-influential-brand-in-the-world/

item.title: Epson introduces an affordable WUXGA projector
item.description:
Epson, a leading manufacturer of projectors, is introducing a new line of affordable Widescreen Ultra Extended Array (WUXGA) projectors. These projectors are designed for business use and offer high-resolution images that surpass Full HD video quality. Siew Jin Kiat, General Manager of Epson Southeast Asia’s Visual Instruments Division, highlighted the significance of this release. For the first time, businesses can access Epson’s renowned high color and brightness projection at competitive prices...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/epson-introduces-an-affordable-wuxga-projector/

item.title: Singtel introduces music services that do not use data
item.description:
Singtel debuted its Singtel Music service, a first-of-its-kind offering in Singapore. For a fixed monthly price, subscribers gain access to music from Spotify, KKBOX, AMPed, and MeRadio without incurring data charges. Representatives from Singtel Music at the launch event. Singtel Music provides premium accounts from Spotify, KKBOX, or AMPed, enabling users to stream an extensive library of songs without data usage concerns. Additionally, they can enjoy 13 MeRadio stations without impacting their data allowance...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/singtel-introduces-music-services-that-do-not-use-data/

item.title: Casual dining is becoming more popular globally
item.description:
A global market research firm, Euromonitor International, determined that consumer food service sales increased by 5.7% worldwide in 2015, a rise from the previous year’s growth rate of 5.3%. Fast casual dining experienced the most significant growth within the industry at 10.4%, generating an extra US$3.4 billion in revenue between 2014 and 2015. Elizabeth Friend, a Consumer Foodservice Strategy Analyst at Euromonitor International, observed, “Consumers are changing their dining habits, especially in developed countries...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/casual-dining-is-becoming-more-popular-globally/

item.title: According to BrandZ, Tencent is currently the most valuable brand in Asia
item.description:
Tencent, a Chinese company, has become the most valuable brand in Asia and the fastest growing brand globally, achieving a brand value of US$54 billion in the 2014 BrandZ Top 100 Most Valuable Global Brands ranking. This success propelled Tencent to the 14th spot globally, surpassing China Mobile. Source: Millward Brown website. Deepender Rana, Managing Director of Millward Brown Greater China, emphasized the significance of a market-driven Chinese brand like Tencent taking the lead over state-owned enterprises...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/according-to-brandz-tencent-is-currently-the-most-valuable-brand-in-asia/

item.title: BrandZ reports that the value of Indian brands has increased by 33%
item.description:
The combined value of India’s top brands has seen a significant increase of 33% over the past year, as reported by the second yearly BrandZ Top 50 Most Valuable Indian Brands ranking from WPP and Millward Brown. This growth rate is the most substantial among all BrandZ rankings in the past decade, surpassing the Global Top 100, China, Latin America, and Indonesia. The current total worth of India’s Top 50 brands is US$92...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/brandz-reports-that-the-value-of-indian-brands-has-increased-by-33/
